summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1194, for the improvement of Belmont Avenue North, from the north line of East Roy Street to Lakeview Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks, wooden curbs, gutters and crosswalks therein, under Ordinance No. 13196 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
